title: Dogecoin, GameStop, AMC, Beyond Meat: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Elon Musk tweeted that Tesla would make merchandise that could be bought with dogecoin; Flagship meme stocks were extending Monday’s slide
body:
Stock futures slipped ahead of the Fed’s two-day policy meeting, which is expected to end with the central bank signaling a quicker road to tighter policy. Here’s what we’re watching in Tuesday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
